98225.name: Central bank independence index, mid-1980s
98225.description: Independence of central bank is calculated by adding together the political independence (Table 12) and the economic independence (Table 13) of the central bank.
98225.s_name: OECD (2015); Grilli, Masciandaro, Tabellini, Malinvaud, Pagano (1991)

source.name: OECD (2015); Grilli, Masciandaro, Tabellini, Malinvaud, Pagano (1991)
